website_summaries.verdict: This sleek product is a great choice for buyers seeking an attractive kitchen mat at a cheaper price tag.
pros: Foam cushion build contours to your feet for supreme comfort
Extremely easy to clean with its stain-resistant surface
Includes a non-slip bottom to prevent sliding
cons: Some owners have issues with the product's durability
A few mats had a chemical odor

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!  Falling apart after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad mat . . . except for the fact that it is not durable! Have been using the mat we purchased since Christmas 2015 in front of our kitchen sink. It is now June 2017 and the mat is falling apart all along the edges. We had a similar but more expensive unit purchased on Frontgate ($100) that lasted for 7 years. Big fan of Amazon Basics, but this product didn't live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: FK57

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on the name "Amazon"
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these mats a little over two years ago for the kitchen (in front of sink and stove). Had relied on the name "Amazon". Usually a good decision but not this time. The mats "walk" on hard floors which is not a deal breaker (I shuffle them back into place a few times a day). Unfortunately the top layer is peeling off from the base. Has gone on for the better part of a year now so we're at the point where we have to toss them out as they've become a tripping hazard for us and a possible health hazard for our dog who tends to eat stuff off the floor. My advice, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Redryder

customer_reviews.title: Declining standards
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a year ago and love it. I recently moved into a new place with a bigger kitchen so I decided to buy a second. What a difference a year makes! They seem to have made some changes to the design, materials, and/or manufacturing process, and it shows. The first one looks and feels good and seems well constructed. It was a great deal! The second looks and feels far cheaper than its relatively inexpensive price tag, even though I paid more for it than I did for the better one a year ago. I expect it to fall apart quickly, if I keep it. 5 stars a year ago, 1 star today.
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: Should've done a little more research
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had the mat for a few weeks and utilize it for my standing desk at work to reduce fatigue in my feet and legs. The mat arrived and appeared just as described and shown. I was disappointed to find that the mat did not provide sufficient improvements in comfort while standing. I tried it with shoes off a few times and, of course, it is much more comfortable but also somewhat awkward to be standing in the office shoe less. I was hoping to get a nice deal on a mat to provide my legs and feet some micro-mobility but it was just not what I was expecting in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but they love to move around and the seams split after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After only 2.5 months use, the seams on all three mats I bought are coming undone. :-( They are very nice to stand on but they will not stay put! I have an oak floor and they seem to migrate away from the counter, several inches per day with normal use. We are constantly having to move them back. I think the bottom needs to be a little tackier to keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: SynePDX

customer_reviews.title: incorrect measurments
customer_reviews.text: this mat is advertised (you can see down at bottom or in compare charts) as being 1.25 inches thick.. it is barely .75... i think its really only .5.. we will see how long it lasts..
customer_reviews.author: Bernie B

customer_reviews.title: Not at all durable - falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Update May 2017: Now the seams are split open on both sides, so it has to go in the trash. Not as durable as it should be. Do not buy. Update 4/20/2016: I have to revise my review from 4 stars down to 2, because today I discovered that, after only 7 months of light use in a household with only 2 adults, one of the seams has split open, so it has proved not to be durable. I'm very sad because I thought it was a good product and I really liked it until now. Original comments: It is very comfy for standing in the kitchen and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 kitchen mats to replaced very old Gel Pro mats. We use them around the busy area of the kitchen where we spend most of our time cooking and cleaning. The mats have curled up on all sides and we are constantly tripping over them which poses a dangerous situation. We are sorry that we bought these mats and should have stayed with the best.
customer_reviews.author: pbbirch

customer_reviews.title: Value Option. Right Size. Great Mat.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know what to say except I'm happy with this anti-fatigue mat. The price was great. It's the right size for my cubicle. It definitely helps with the foot fatigue/pain/hot spots. If I was to give one criticism it's that the top of the mat is not as nice as some of the more "premium" products. This mat is a single molded piece of rubber, others have a slick/smooth cover attached. 100% disclosure though, I don't think it makes any difference in the performance. If you're on the fence about this one let me put your fears to rest. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Pairs Nicely with My Standing Desk
customer_reviews.text: My office was willing to buy me a standing desk for ergonomic reasons, but not a mat. Go figure. So I bought this one. After a few days of sore feet I bought this one. I have three similar mats in my kitchen and they make an immense difference when standing on a hard floor for long periods of time. So, if you have a standing desk, or a kitchen, or anywhere else you stand in one place, get one of the these. Your feet and knees will thank you. You might get a rug to go over top -- these will wear over time (they are basically a thick vinyl cover on foam) and a rug will mitigate that.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: The mat punctured on day three!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat because I have a stand up work station. A couple co-workers also have stand up stations so they wanted to test it. One woman stood on it while wearing heels and wasn't on it for more than two seconds when the heel of her shoe punctured the mat. She's average height and not overweight. I'm pretty disappointed in the product and am looking to have it replaced or returned. If not for this incident, I'd have given it a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered just one of these mats but I liked it so much that I ordered 2 more. They are super comfortable to stand on and really help prevent the pain I tend to get in my hips and lower back whenever I stand too long. They do tend to move, though, so I just added a couple of the Velcro Command Strips (large) on the sides of each mat and now they stay put. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shari W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased four of these and just about a year and they are separating and starting to trip on them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Voets Jr.

customer_reviews.title: We've spilled on them many times cooking and they wipe right off very easily. Our one gripe is that while they have ...
customer_reviews.text: The value for these mats is great- we've been using them for several months and they are very supportive and hold up well. We've spilled on them many times cooking and they wipe right off very easily. Our one gripe is that while they have a backing that is supposed to keep them in place on our hardwood floors, they continue to float around our floors and never stay in place. We tried putting shelf-liner below them to keep them in place, that did not work either. They don't slide- slipping is not an issue...they just gradually "float" and need to be moved back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P.

customer_reviews.title: I wondered why I hadn't done this a long time ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little Mat totally changed and IMPROVED my Standing Desk lifestyle as I can now stand for hours with MUCH LESS Fatigue and anxiety! Thanks to a co-worker who introduced me to a similar product but my Amazon Basics version became the envy of the office for the quality and price! It's been over 6 months since I started using it and it hasn't missed a beat! Still very much Soft and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: David Oz

customer_reviews.title: Slides on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay in place, slides around the floor and this is on 12"x12" tiles. Would not recommend or buy again. Really need to watch out for products that don't work as advertised being sold on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: di-hydroxymethyl

customer_reviews.title: So good i bought a second
customer_reviews.text: In my previous position the standing desk employees were also provided with mats. In my new spot they didn't have them for people so I ordered this and now I can stand for 6-8 hours. In fact sometimes I catch myself standing all shift. Without it I can only stand for 1 or 2 hours. I let the rest of my team try it out and they were super impressed. I ordered one for our team that they could share and they notice a huge difference too. Also during my year end performance review with our VP I offered for her to try it also. A day later she ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Nyck

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to make-shift standing desk
customer_reviews.text: During this new work-from-home life, I couldn't use my couches or chairs to get work done and occasionally felt back pain. I shifted to a standing desk, but legs and feet definitely felt the hardwood floors. The mat was a great addition to relieve some of that stress on my lower body and I have not had the upper body pain. Very happy with it for this temporary situation. I think it will continue to be useful in my kitchen when this is over too.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Seidler

customer_reviews.title: This thing really makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have my workshop in my basement. The floors are plain concrete. If I stand for a long period of time I start to get back ache. With this mat, I can increase my standing time with less fatigue. It is a very substantial rubber mat. I highly recommend it if you are looking for something to reduce fatigue through standing. The size is big enough if you are standing still. If you are moving around you will probably need more than one.
customer_reviews.author: TwoDogNight

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Both of the ones we brought are seperating at the seem, terrible product....TRASH
customer_reviews.author: Saucey

customer_reviews.title: Not so great. Did not live upto my expectation from Amazon Brand
customer_reviews.text: I researched multiple brands before buying this one. The other brands were costly so I went with the Amazon brand. My expectation from anti-fatigue mats were to have cushion like foam and sponginess. But they are completely opposite and are pretty hard. If you are in interested in purchasing 1-2 mats, please go with other brands. Also, check for height of the mat. There are some costly brands with height of 1". Will not recommend unless buying to be used for short duration.
customer_reviews.author: Prashank

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have said, these mats move around when you walk on them. You will be constantly having to put them back in place. After two years the mats have started to curl up in the corners and make a tripping hazard. Get yourself some other mats.
customer_reviews.author: ⚜️MS⚜️

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I recently started working form home, but wanted to continue using my stand up desk. I ordered the 20X36 inch black mat. It is the prefect size, unless you are like me and have a German Shepherd who insists on sharing the mat with you. Then I would go a size larger. lol It is truly a very comfortable mat. Stays in place even on slippery floors.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: A pair of memory foam slippers might have been a better idea than this.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good only day one out of the box. This is a pack of 5. 4 more than I needed. I should have read the description. It is easy to stand on but not easy to move which I guess is good. But makes it hard with a sit/stand desk to stand up or sit down as I have to move the mat. Not sure this is going to be my final solution for this. I might have been better off investing in a pair of good comfortable shoes or memory foam slippers for my sit/stand desk. Jury is still out on this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: great for standing desks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I want to stand at my standing desk. I know that it's cheaper than other versions, and foam, not gel, but I have no complaints. It's very comfortable, whether you're wearing shoes or not. It stays clean, and I have no seen any wear and tear and I've had it for a while now. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Iplish

customer_reviews.title: not too big, not too small, decent thickness
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. My knees and back thank me. I'm using this with a standing desk. Plenty of cushion. Wipes clean with a damp cloth easily. Stores behind my desk no problem when I'm sitting. Enough room to step around a bit if needed. If I were to change something, I might make it just a couple inches wider but that's a reach at this point. Very happy with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my kitchen to put in front of my sink area as we do almost all dishes by hand washing which can involve a lot of time standing in one spot and as a taller man at 6'4" this can really wear on me. I immediately noticed a difference in pain during extended standing periods with this thing and will likely order a second mat to go in front of the stove for similar reasons. 100% satisfied with my purchase and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stand on while I do my hair and makeup. I have hardwood floors and want something with more cushion to stand on but did not want to deal with a rug. This mat is so comfortable to stand on - takes the pressure off my legs and back. Was a little firmer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rosegirl

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is a thick memory foam. I was hoping for a high quality foam due to the price and I got it! It's perfect size for placing in front of your kitchen sink, stove, or large bathroom counters. It may be too large for some bathrooms if you only have a stand alone sink. I was nervous that the leather would not be woven together tight enough, causing them to get caught or torn easily, but they are woven tightly. The bottom is a nonslip material. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Witchy

customer_reviews.title: Matts curled on edges causing safety risk
customer_reviews.text: These matts functioned well until exposed to a warm location. The result was a very functional and comfortable matt that is limited in it's usefulness because the edges curled, causing a safety issue. It's very easy to trip over the edges of this matt when they are curled up.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value proposition (5-pack)
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 5 pack, and I can say that it is an amazing value. The mat itself is pretty thick and on the firmer side. While I’m not sure how well it would stack against identical competing products (priced much higher/unit), it will likely provide the comfort you are looking to get for a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: AlbinoRhino

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured, inexpensive imitation of photo and advertisement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very first picture shows a high-quality waffle pattern design, this is a very cheaply produced, non textured imitation! So disappointing we live in a very very rural area of North Dakota so returns are at best extremely inconvenient, most likely stuck with purchase and warn of false advertising....
customer_reviews.author: TAMI SNOW

customer_reviews.title: Great pad to stand on
customer_reviews.text: Now that I'm working from home, I needed a pad to stand on. This pad is even better than the one at the office. It really cushions my feet
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered to cover my tile floor at the sink.
customer_reviews.text: Standing on tile floors for more than a few moments tends to make my back to begin hurting. These mats allow me to stand for longer periods of time before discomfort. I bought 3. One for the sink, one for the stove, and one to cover my food prep area. I cannot attest to the durability as I haven't had them that long. They appear well made and I'm not expecting problems with edge fraying as happens on some of these. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B. Creek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion support. I am a little surprised at other reviews saying how this is not durable. I work in a retail store that is open approximately 13 hours a day. This mat has just started showing signs of breaking down after a years worth of use. The most upsetting part of this mat was when I returned to buy another one, it was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lelievre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price
customer_reviews.text: I am totally stoked by the quality and l price of this pad. I love my standing desk now! At this price point it’s a no brainer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JPJ

customer_reviews.title: A tad small but perfect relief for those long dish jobs
customer_reviews.text: I expect to go through one of these every few years, since the outer shell material eventually separates from the padding. It's just a bit smaller than the pad I replaced (originally purchased from the place that quit selling Polish hot dogs) but manages to do the job nonetheless. It's a must-have for those long kitchen shifts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Trip over this thing daily
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this mat for well over a year now. It looks good, is comfortable, and is easy to clean. However, no matter what I try I can not get the edges to lay flat. Rolled them up and taped them, stuck it in the sun for hours, nothing works. It will slowly go back to rolled up edges within the hour and I will be tripping on it within minutes of that. I have come close to throwing this thing out the door more than once because of this. Amazon, if your listening, please fix this issue and maybe replace the ones that people have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Pierson T Rintz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of cushion and support.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this mat for my standing desk at work. Before I had the mat, I noticed when I stood at my desk my feet would start hurting after about an hour (the flooring is carpeting, but there's no cushion, just concrete underneath). This mat give the perfect amount of cushion and support. My feet no longer hurt when using my standing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up in the long run
customer_reviews.text: They haven't held up over the long haul, they slide across the floor constantly and the edges have all curled up, making them a trip hazard. They are also not as comfortable as when they were new, my mom has a different brand that is older, used more, and has held up light years better.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: im using this for a vr mat to know where my playspace is. its very noticeable when you step off it, its about a half inch off the ground. its comfy to stand on and is really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SinnaJean

customer_reviews.title: Trip Hazard/hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: These feel great and are great for the feet. However, hard to clean and the edges kept rolling up causing a trip hazard.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my mother in law who is 75 and formerly did her dishes standing only on a tile floor. It has helped alleviate some of her back issues while standing but is not AS thick and spongy as the one I have at home. For the price, a great deal though. Just know your needs and buy accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Mat is really thick and feels good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stand at my sit/stand desk to remove some pressure on my feet and hips. It works just fine and I like the looks of it, but found out afterwards that you can get the same thing as a kitchen mat for a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: pcs

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: These do not last by that I mean the edges separated they just didn't hold up. I have two of them in the kitchen and neither of them have held up the edges split. Define toy not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: georgina rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Feel no difference
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but I feel no difference. The product seems to be made well, but I've stood on other anti-fatigue mats that have much more give thus providing more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Reny

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found this. I wanted a mat like this for a while to go in front of my kitchen sink, but everywhere I looked charged too much for this type of mat. This mat is easy to clean and so nice to have under my feet while I’m doing dishes or cooking at the stove! It’s high quality material as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper88

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We bought it to our in the “landing zone” where our dog insists on jumping off the steps at; such a soft landing for her, over hardwood floors. It stays in place, edges don’t curl. 10/10 would recommend. I just bought 5 more!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Good size. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, i tend to move around alot when using my standing desk and this is plenty big for those of us who tend to wiggle. Edges have a nice slope down so you don't fall off the edge when moving on an off it as well. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reluctant adult

customer_reviews.title: nice product if it didnt cure up on edges
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for 2 years and I am completey satisfied. This one with in four months has started curing up around edges which creates a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: robby

customer_reviews.title: Beautifu!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at so many! This one fits my needs and space perfectly. The design is easy to clean. My husband has foot arthritis and he said it helped his feet feel better, he was dancing on it! :) I have sciatic and can't stand in one place for long. This helps! Also as I said in a previous review of the Ovente electric kettle, the colors match perfectly! My dogs love to lay on it too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Body comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasing surprised when I put my feet onto this mat. I worked in hospital facilities department where we always put them in labs so I thought to purchase on for my sit stand set up at my computer. Well needless to say I was pleasing surprised how my legs felt less stressed and my heels. Wish there were a plus sign for this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid standing mat that makes dishes more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mat works great - really happy I got it. It's super comfortable and easy to clean. Very happy I purchased. It does slip a bit on my wood floor - so recommend getting something to put under to stop that.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Mildew Smell
customer_reviews.text: The mat has a very strong mildew smell apparent even through the box but no apparent mold or mildew on the outside of the mat. It could be in the foam itself and it's why I ended up returning it. The box had already been opened and resealed looking at the ripped product label on the edge of the box, so it was probably returned by someone else for the same reason. Hope you don't get this one... Aside from the awful smell the foam was rather stiff and not at all like memory foam. I typically like Amazon Basic items, but in this case there are much better ones around and I recommend you pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: kayc

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Offers good cushion. I wish the bottom was a bit anti-slip though—I'm finding it slowly creeps every day under my desk, on the carpeted floor. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but good quality
customer_reviews.text: A ljttle on the expensive side, but better quality than what’s available in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Hekmat

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the workplace. Bought this for a friend who stands on tile all day at her waitress job. She has said it’s done wonders. I have mine at home in the kitchen and it’s great for when I’m cooking or washing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Jorif

customer_reviews.title: No problems with this particular mat at all
customer_reviews.text: I feel badly that I've only given this mat three stars. It's not that I have a problem with this mat. It's fine. I just find that I kick it out of the way and forget to use it way more often than not, which tells me that I don't find a whole lot of benefit from it.
customer_reviews.author: Winesburger

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem in a foot and I like to work standing up. The only one way is using this mat. Is perfect for my foot. I ordered a cangaroo brand before but my feet keep hurting even that the cangaroo is fluffier.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Two years in...... Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: We like many Amazon Basics products and thought it was a no-brainer to give this one a try. We have ceramic tile in the kitchen, and it gets hard on the feet when standing long periods of time. We are now 24 months into the ownership of one of these mats and all four sides are separating. The first couple of sides started just after 1 year. The warranty is 1 year. I didn't plan to replace our mats every 24 months, so this is not a very good value proposition for us. But to each their own! The top has not separated/cracked like our Gel-Pro Brand mats have.
customer_reviews.author: Jubal Early

customer_reviews.title: Watch you step!
customer_reviews.text: After less than 18 months, the corners started to curl up and resisted being curled the opposite way. That said, anybody who comes in contact with it trips over the corners. It is a safety hazard, and I cannot recommend these mats period.
customer_reviews.author: GSJos

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for pain
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It really helps my legs and back on my tile floor. Looking forward to buying another. It should be easy to clean but I can't tell if it's dirt or color rubbing off. There's always discoloration on the paper towel when I wipe it.
customer_reviews.author: TedsPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off too soon
customer_reviews.text: Did not last as they mention. It started to riped from the sides after 2 yr. It would be nice if i get replacement since it was too pricey when i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Makes A Difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the gas station industry for 20 years. Being on your feet that long has gotten very difficult, especially after breaking my ankle in 2018! I ordered this pad with hopes of some pain relief but the quality of it amazed me beyond expectation. Not only has it helped greatly while on the job but I've noticed an enormous difference throughout my day! The padding is thicker than it looks and so comfy! You won't regret this investment.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan H.

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable to stand on. Use as a kitchen mat. Had for less than a year and it's starting to come apart at the seams. Also does not stay in place it does move on my flooring.
customer_reviews.author: LLT14

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work at a restaurant for cooks to use when standing for long periods cutting meat. Everyone says they love it and it’s very comfortable to stand on. Would recommend and will probably buy more for other areas of restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: wwlarado

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE, AND DURABLE.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a Benjamin Moore Paint store. I am on my feet all day on a painted concrete floor all day. This is a tremendous help. I would buy this again. UPDATE! I did buy this again. We now have one in our other location.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ez to Clean.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this for my office, then I put in my kitchen, now I use to do push ups. It's a nice simple mat but not much cushion for me. It's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rios

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this with my standing desk. Highly recommend for help with long periods of standing and great if you have back issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Howard

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat -- medium firm, and solid -- gives confidence and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It's just like in the picture -- very sturdy, about 3/4" high, with a good give without being spongy in the least. It feels like it will last a long time. It has a non-slip bottom to keep it in place, and the top, while not leather, gives a good imitation of looking like leather.
customer_reviews.author: c waller

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: My work group just got standing desks last month, so a bunch of us ordered the 5-pack. The order came within two days of ordering, which was great. I've been using the mat for standing along with sitting down, which involves sliding my chair on and off the mat. I usually have to lift the chair up to get it onto the mat, but not really a problem and haven't noticed any wear.
customer_reviews.author: KN nyc

customer_reviews.title: My Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Wife for her use at work and she loves it! I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It is useful
customer_reviews.text: I have the mat in my home office but not in my office in my company. The perfect control is right there. I don't feel much fatigue when working at home but I do notice the difference when I work in my company's office. I hope the price can be lower because this product really costs a little to manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to standing desk
customer_reviews.text: This mat was a lifesaver! Since I’m now working at home, I finally got a standing desk. The mat is a huge help. Definitely made it easier to spend some of the workday standing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🙃
customer_reviews.text: Used this for in front of my kitchen sink and ordered another for in front of my stove
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Good value for prices
customer_reviews.text: This mat replaced a more expensive mat that was curling up at the edges and was a tripping risk. This mat provides the same comfort without the curling edges.
customer_reviews.author: PDHMD

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what we wanted, but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as soft as the other mats we’ve had in the past for about the same price. Maybe it takes longer than a year to break in, but the other mats have been soft as soon as we put them down.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home office standing desk
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for your home office, especially to help acclimate to a standing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I assume the mats that cost twice as much are better but this basically does what I want at a price I felt comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Easton

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do like the color, and that it's not very textured (my worn out fatigue mat was very textured, making it harder to keep clean.) It could be thicker, but for this price, I think it's very reasonable. If I decide to upgrade to a thicker mat, I'm sure my husband would be happy to have this in his shop.
customer_reviews.author: Nanalisarocks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe.
customer_reviews.text: Adequately tapered edges prevent tripping on this thick mat especially when placed in a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: cyclesaurus

customer_reviews.title: It quickly starts to fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and between the holidays and business travel probably used it about 50 or 60 times and already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use at my standing desk at work instead of a $70 option made specifically for that purpose. I think this is a great alternative. I can stand for much longer now with less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Leah C

customer_reviews.title: Good dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Big enough that it covered two main standing areas in my kitchen, sink and a counter to prep. It’s cushiony but you don’t feel like your falling into it. Very good grip to a tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feet and Lumbar relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have my friends “try it out” when they visit. It isn’t as dense and cushy as one I previously bought at Kohl’s and gave away when o moved. Otherwise I wouldn’t have known.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Chihocky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality mat, especially for the price. We have it in front of our kitchen sink. We tried several others that had a weird texture or finish making them hard to wipe clean, or would slide around. This mat is nice and thick and stays in place. It also wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: AshTheSmash

customer_reviews.title: My wife's idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a great investment, really helps with pain and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Vinal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good quality. Time will tell on durability, but so far no issues. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad by itself
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad by itself, although it is a little on the thin side. I had a memory foam mat that I put on top of this, and together they are awesome. By itself it just leaves me wanting just a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Working From Home
customer_reviews.text: As part of a new effort to work from home, this anti-fatigue mat came in handy. It is a little bigger than expected, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor mat. The woven look brings out the uniqueness. Rarely moves and is super easy to clean. I have 3 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but need a stickier back side
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dont like is they move around too easily. Other than that they clean easy and are comfortable to stand on for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my standing desk. It makes my day better.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Oh What a Cushy Feeling
customer_reviews.text: This cushion works great in absorbing the shock of standing for long stints. I was surprised at how big the mat was...it fit well in the space under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: A. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good gel, flimsy coating
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself is very nice -- the gel makes a big difference when standing all day. However, after just a year of daily use, the rubberized coating has hardened and is beginning to break away. The upper coating does not seem to be bonded to the gel substrate very well. The mat also has a habit of "walking" around as I shift my weight -- I have to push the mat back into place several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Krizak

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen mat I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Had this mat a year and it’s still doing the job! I just purchased one for my mom, because she is always complementing ours when she is over. We use it in our kitchen but I may also get another for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BMS

customer_reviews.title: Stick and cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace the old mats and they’re so much better! They don’t slide in the floor and are super cushioned. Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Good Mat
customer_reviews.text: I paired this mat with a sit/stand desk and it’s great. I do wish it was a little thicker, but for the price, this is a pretty good mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This type of product is essential for pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Marami

customer_reviews.title: Helps was feet/back issues from standing
customer_reviews.text: Wish was lil cheaper but works fine for my music setup
customer_reviews.author: Damian Rodriguez

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Premium Anti-Fatigue Standing Comfort Mat for Home and Office, 20 x 36 Inch, Black
feature_bullets: Anti-fatigue mat reduces fatigue when standing, perfect for kitchens or standing desks
Cushiony foam layer conforms to the contours of your feet
Stain- and abrasion-resistant surface; easy to clean
Non-curling edges so you won't trip. Non-slip base so the mat stays in one place
